SYSTEM: 03_RDF%28S%29_APIS_and_SPARQL_%28complete%29.pdf: Página 6
© O. Corcho, R.García-Castro, O. Muñoz-García
6
RDF and RDF Schema
Sesame
•
A framework for storage, querying and inferencing of RDF and 
RDF Schema
•
A Java Library for handling RDF
•
A Database Server for (remote) access to repositories of RDF data
•
Highly expressive query and transformation languages
– SeRQL, SPARQL
•
Various backends
– Native Store
– RDBMS (MySQL, Oracle 10, DB2, PostgreSQL)
– main memory
•
Reasoning support
– RDF Schema reasoner
– OWL DLP (OWLIM)
– domain reasoning (custom rule engine)
speaker: SYSTEM
